data.title: Cannabis Advisory Committee To Hold Virtual Meeting In September
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) announced today that the Cannabis Advisory Committee will hold a two-day virtual meeting on Thursday, September 24 and Friday, September 25, 2020.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
